messages.content: Harriett Baldwin has lived in Shelsley Beauchamp with her family for the last 4 years since she was selected as the Conservative parliamentary candidate.
Harriett is fighting this campaign in an honest and transparent way. She has run several large local campaigns on the following issues:

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bring improved flood defences to Upton, Uckinghall, Powick, Kempsey and Pershore.
Bring the new hospital to Malvern.
Fight against inappropriate developments and protect our green belt from 25,500 more houses.

issues.environment: Fight against inappropriate developments and protect our green belt from 25,500 more houses.
issues.health: Bring the new hospital to Malvern.

housing.content: Fight against inappropriate developments and protect our green belt from 25,500 more houses.

politicalExperience.role: Home-Start volunteer and Vice Chair of Governors at a local Primary School
politicalExperience.achievements: Harriett works on a range of public issues affecting the people of West Worcestershire, the NHS, the economy, and education issues.

contactInformation.address: The Great Malvern Hotel, Graham Road, Great Malvern, Worcestershire, WR14 2HN

endorsements.endorsement: I felt I had to put the record straight and I ask you to reject the negative personal attacks from the Liberal Democrats and give Harriett Baldwin your support at this vital election to ensure that we don't have five more years of Gordon Brown in Westminster.

images.caption: Jeremy Sutton, Owner of the Great Malvern Hotel endorses Harriett Baldwin.

leaflet.additionalNotes: To avoid strategic voting advice, it's important to use your vote at the election on 6th May. It is vital that we send a message to Gordon Brown and vote Conservative.
